Package it.rossettidigiorgiomonica.sportsclubexercise.classes

Class Activity

java.lang.Object
it.rossettidigiorgiomonica.sportsclubexercise.classes.Activity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Competition, Course
public abstract class Activity
extends Object
The Activity class defines a behavior that: Manages the creation of sports activity of the club. It also allows to manage subscriptions to these activities. Activities can be of two types: courses or competitions described in separated classes
Author:
297398

    • setActivityName

      public void setActivityName​(Person admin, String newName) throws IllegalAccessException
      Permit to modify the activity name.
      Parameters:
      admin - user with the necessary permission to modify the activity.
      newName - the new activity name
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - in case the current user doesn't have permissions
